name: UMEONI
description:
Umeoni is based on @wednesdaynight's story.

Story

You and your friends go to school at night to play Umeoni.

In order to summon the Oni you need to write your name on the paper and put it under the pillow, then say "Umeoni let's play chasing" 3 times.

The rule is simple,  just don't get caught.

You have done it and gone to sleep.  Suddenly you woke up in an unfamiliar place but you notice that this place looks similar to your school.  You need to find a way to get out of here while you're being hunted by something...

V2.0 Update
  • Added a "stamina bar" to allow Player to run in a short duration 
  • Added more letters to balance the game difficulties
Control

WASD  to move

LShift to sprint
